snippet: Alan Gilbert knows that he is the public face of the New York Philharmonic, and is shaping a legacy of both popular and groundbreaking efforts by the orchestra.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini lauds conductor Alan Gilbert for being an innovative leader who has fully taken on role as public face of the New York Philharmonic; notes he is shaping a legacy of both popular and groundbreaking efforts by the orchestra.
lead_paragraph: Alan Gilbert knows that he is the public face of the New York Philharmonic, and is shaping a legacy of both popular and groundbreaking efforts by the orchestra.

headline.print_headline: A Conductor Puts Himself Out There, Beyond the Parks
headline.seo: Alan Gilbert Shapes a Legacy of Change at the Philharmonic
headline.main: A Conductor Puts Himself Out There, Beyond the Parks
